text.0: In a woman with thyroid cancer expressing an EML4-NTRK3 fusion gene, the cancer had become refractory to radioactive iodine when the capacity of the tumors to take up iodine was lost.
text.1: Among women in low-resource countries who were at risk for early preterm birth, the use of antenatal dexamethasone resulted in lower risks of neonatal death alone and stillbirth or neonatal death than the use of placebo.
text.2: A recent study showed that the differentiation of fibroblasts in the sublining of the synovium of the rheumatoid joint capsule is influenced by the vascular endothelium and implicates the Notch3 receptor in this process.
text.3: The FDA on Thursday officially approved #remdesivir (Veklury) to treat #COVID19. Elsewhere, the CDC has redefined what it considers a close contact of someone with COVID-19.
text.4: This interactive feature about a man hospitalized with Covid-19 whose condition is worsening offers a case vignette accompanied by two essays, each of which recommends a different approach to anticoagulation for the prevention of VTE in a patient with severe Covid-19.
text.5: In patients with chronic kidney disease and type 2 diabetes, treatment with finerenone resulted in lower risks of CKD progression and cardiovascular events than placebo. #KidneyWk
text.6: A 55-year-old-man with a history of neurofibromatosis and chronic necrotizing pancreatitis presented with abdominal pain and recurrent painful skin lesions. Read the full MGH case record.
